statements: UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = 50 WHERE timestamp = '2022-03-15 12:00:00' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = 60 WHERE timestamp = '2022-03-16 08:00:00' AND device_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = 70 WHERE timestamp = '2022-03-17 15:30:00' AND device_id = '345e6789-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = energy_consumed + 10 WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND location_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = energy_consumed * 1.2 WHERE device_id = '423e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = energy_consumed - 5 WHERE timestamp = '2022-11-15 10:00:00' AND device_id = '623e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionTrends SET trend_name = 'New Trend' WHERE trend_id = 1;
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET date = '2023-12-31' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = 150.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionTrends SET trend_description = 'New Description' WHERE trend_id = 5;
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionTrends SET trend_name = 'Updated Trend Name', trend_description = 'Updated Trend Description' WHERE trend_id = 2;
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET consumption = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE energy_consumption_patterns SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE energy_consumption_trends SET trend_type = 'Growth' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET consumption = consumption + 100 WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE energy_consumption_patterns SET description = 'New description' WHERE pattern_name = 'Peak';
UPDATE energy_consumption_trends SET trend_name = 'Updated Trend', trend_type = 'Forecast' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET consumption_kwh = 150 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Locations SET city = 'New City' WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 5;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET consumption_kwh = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE Patterns SET pattern_description = 'New pattern description' WHERE pattern_id = 3;
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET consumption_value = 150.5 WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE energy_devices SET device_name = 'Smart Meter' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE energy_locations SET region = 'West' WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET consumption_value = consumption_value * 1.1 WHERE timestamp > now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
UPDATE energy_devices SET device_name = 'New Device Name' WHERE device_id = 5
UPDATE energy_locations SET region = 'Europe' WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3)
